content: I have again more Countermail invite codes for sale.Countermail is THE best private mail service you can get. Forget about Protonmail or Tutanota. With Countermail you have access to your private keys for decrypting your mail. Protonmail and Tutanota doesn't give you this feature.Price will be 116USD and payment in BTC. You can pay with bank or CC, but because you are extending my service it is better to use BTC. You will get an invite code so you can signup with Countermail. I am not trying to make money of this. It is simple. You'll extend my service at Countermail with 2 years (equals 116USD) and i send you an invite code. In this way i don't make money from it and i support Countermail for their stunning job of real private mail service. So the money goes to them, not me. i only get a 2 year extra for their services.Contact me for more info
